resources.string: -1B01: Go right from the stairs, first room on your left.
-1B02: Go right from the stairs, second room on your left.
-1B03: Go to right from the stairs, third room on your left
Restroom: Go to right from the stairs, go straight then turn left. Second room on your left.
Auditorum: Go right from the stairs, second room on your right.
Common Room: Go right from the stairs, first room on your right.
-1B07: Go to right from the stairs, go straight.
-1B06: Go to right from the stairs, go straight then turn right. First room on your left
